LanguageData.VCO.RangedModule.WeaponRecoil_Desc: Whether or not ranged weapons will get accuracy penalties when burst-firing.
LanguageData.VCO.RangedModule.ShotgunRevamp_Desc: Whether or not shotguns will fire proper buckshot rounds.
LanguageData.VCO.RangedModule.ShotgunDamageRounding_R: Pellet damage will randomly be rounded up or down depending on decimal value - 3.7 has a 70% chance of being rounded up to 4, and a 30% chance of being rounded down to 3.
LanguageData.VCO.RangedModule.ShotgunDamageRounding_S: Pellet damage will follow standard rounding rules - down if decimal value is less than 0.5, otherwise up.
LanguageData.VCO.RangedModule.ShotgunDamageRounding_F: Pellet damage will always be rounded down.
LanguageData.VCO.RangedModule.ShotgunDamageRounding_C: Pellet damage will always be rounded up.
